name: Keiba Eight '98 Aki Fuyu
overview: Keiba Eito '98 Akifuyu is the first game in the Keiba Eito series for the Playstation console, the first games of the series were released in the Super Nintendo console. In the game the player can only go through different stats of horses, places & jockeys. the game is heavy on japanese text, so only people that can fully understand japanese will like this game.
